name: Stuck In Time Episode: 1
description:
Stuck In Time is a Sci-Fi Interactive Fiction game where you unravel the mysteries of time as you try to navigate an unknown world. Will you be able to escape or will despair overcome you….?

Piece together the answer to the secrets of this world through the choices you make. Choose new paths and you will be granted a deeper understanding of the reasons behind your predicament.

Experience the start of your journey in the future through the first episode of this epic story.

The future is yours to behold.

 

Be sure to check out the pixel-art animated backgrounds in full-screen by pressing Tab to immerse yourself while playing the game.

Included with the game is a 4-page Epilogue to the episode providing a deeper look at this world.

Omni Time Studios is an Indie game development start-up that aims to create new interactive gaming experiences. We hope you look forward to our future titles and if you enjoy our content, be sure to follow us on our Social Media pages.
